data.title: CUSTOM DESIGN
data.text:
Custom Mold Making

With our active mould workshop, we can design and present to you a long-lasting, suitable mould that will meet your packaging needs.

Your needs are determined.

Ideas are exchanged for the most optimal packaging of your product.

Prototypes are made by our experienced employees with our 3D Printers.

The product is presented to you with multiple options and the necessary revisions are made.

With the selected design, mold making processes are started.

Custom Label Design

We can make creative, original and aesthetic label designs with our own graphic design team. We can revise the project from the beginning to the end, and we can offer you labels as you wish.

Opinions are exchanged on how best to reflect your company in label design.

Our Graphic Design department offers you ideas,

It is decided what kind of path we will take.

The label is submitted for your approval.
